thread.title: BRIEF-Silver Grant International Industries Says Unit Sold 7.5 Mln Shares Of China Unionpay For Rmb195.0 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Silver Grant International Industries Says Unit Sold 7.5 Mln Shares Of China Unionpay For Rmb195.0 Mln

organizations.name: brief-silver grant international industries says unit
reuters) - silver grant international industries ltd

text:
Jan 18 (Reuters) - Silver Grant International Industries Ltd :
* UNIT SOLD 7.5 MILLION SHARES OF CHINA UNIONPAY FOR RMB195.0 MILLION
* WILL RECOGNISE AN AFTER TAX GAIN OF ABOUT RMB112.5 MILLION FROM DISPOSAL FOR YEAR ENDED 31 DEC 2018â€‹ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
